title: Streaming service subscribers in India 2017
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and Number of subscribers in millions in each Video-on-demand Service on the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in millions is highest at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and lowest at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
There is a difference of 60.6 between the maximum Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and minimum Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of subscribers in millions for 6 number of Video-on-demand Services.
The Number of subscribers in millions is highest at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and lowest at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and Number of subscribers in millions in each Video-on-demand Service on the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in millions is highest at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and lowest at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
There is a difference of 60.6 between the maximum Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and minimum Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and Number of subscribers in millions in each Video-on-demand Service on the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and lowest at Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV.
The highest value at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar is 26.25x times more than the lowest value at Ozee TV.
Number of subscribers in millions at Video-on-demand Service Hotstar is 63.0 , second place is Voot at 13.2, and thirdly is Amazon Video at 9.5.
The Video-on-demand Service Hotstar tends to be 3.9 percent higher than average.
The Number of subscribers in millions is 96.9 if we add up values of all Video-on-demand Services.
